S.FORM: Jorge Lopes Bom Jesus u siwkay niza u pilecuhan ni Jorge Lopes Bom Jesus i Agua Grande . nalecuhan ciniza i 7 a bulad 26 a demiad 1962 a mihcaan. pahezekay niza i tabakiay a cacudadan nu Sao Tome and Principe (University of São Tomé and Príncipe ). mala ku sasaydan niza. micakat u cunli ( Prime Minister) nu Sao Tome and Principe ayza sa ci Tuilaepa Lupesoliai Sailele Malielegaoi , micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihcaan 12 bulad 3 demiad. u ngangan niza u sulit tu ngangan nu Portugala kamu:Jorge Lopes Bom Jesus u sulit tu ngangan nu hulam a kamu: u sulit tu ngangan nu Sakizaya a kamu:Zezu Luwpyese Puwmu Zesuse u sapuyaay a kakuniza kakuniza malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government Jorge Bom Jesus
